name: bmarwell-website
description: Personal website for Benjamin Marwell with optimized build pipeline

scripts.build: npm run build:html && npm run build:fonts && npm run build:avatar && npm run build:compress
scripts.build:minify: mkdir -p dist && html-minifier-terser --collapse-whitespace --remove-comments --remove-optional-tags --remove-redundant-attributes --remove-script-type-attributes --remove-tag-whitespace --use-short-doctype --minify-css true --minify-js true -o dist/index.html src/main/html/index.html && cp src/main/html/.htaccess dist/.htaccess
scripts.build:compress: npm run compress:zstd && npm run compress:brotli && npm run compress:gzip
scripts.preview: npm run build && npm run serve
